org.gjt.sp.jedit.io
Class VFSManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.gjt.sp.jedit.io.VFSManager
public class VFSManager
extends java.lang.Object

jEdit's virtual filesystem allows it to transparently edit files stored elsewhere than the local filesystem, for example on an FTP site.

Version:
$Id: VFSManager.java,v 1.7 2002/06/01 02:32:02 spestov Exp $
Author:
Slava Pestov
